metadata.name: Nslookup PowerShell Download Cradle - ProcessCreation
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious powershell download cradle using nslookup. This cradle uses nslookup to extract payloads from DNS records

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\nslookup.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('\\nslookup.exe') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -q=txt ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -querytype=txt '))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious powershell download cradle using nslookup. This cradle uses nslookup to extract payloads from DNS records
